DOC.brief_summary: This pilot longitudinal mixed-methods study pregnant woman ( n=20 ) participate CPC+Y VCU Health System Nelson Clinic Virginia Department Health Richmond Health District 's prenatal clinic ( RHD ) pregnancies . This pilot project provide necessary preliminary data fuel appropriately power randomize control trial evaluate effect CPC+Y control weight gain , enhance stress resilience , improve maternal-child outcome among overweight/obese diverse woman . Because increase physical activity find important mental health effect maternal-child outcome , stand reason innovative intervention potential impact way prenatal care deliver high risk population .
DOC.brief_title: Centering Pregnancy Care + Yoga Diverse Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman age 18 year older currently participate CPC VCU Health System Nelson Clinic Richmond Health District current physical condition prevent participation physical activity ( ACOG guideline : restrictive lung disease , hemodynamically significant heart disease , incompetent cervix , multiple gestation risk premature labor , persistent 2nd 3rd trimester bleeding , placenta previa 26 week gestation , premature labor , rupture membrane , preeclampsia , severe anemia )
